nodes.text: Star Wars: The Old Republic is a comic book series published by Dark Horse Comics that ties into the Star Wars: The Old Republic massively multiplayer roleplaying online game by LucasArts and BioWare. The first six issues of this comic are a re-release of the Star Wars: The Old Republic webcomics, Threat of Peace and Blood of the Empire, in printed format, and the third arc, The Lost Suns, was released only in comic format.
